mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gas X-ray tube
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gas X-ray tube on a wooden stand. Engraved on glass: "Victor, Macalaster Wiggin Co., Trade Mark, Made in Boston, Tungsten, 478." Macalaster Wiggin Co. merged with Victor Electric Co. and later became General Electric Co. This item was given in honor of Theodore E. Keats, M.D., F.A.C.R., Chair of the UVa Department of Radiology from 1963-1991.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--X-rays--Equipment and supplies
